articles.description: Antoine Dupont inspires France as they cruise to a record opening Six Nations victory against woeful Wales in Paris.
articles.title: France 38-0 Wales: Antoine Dupont inspires hosts to Six Nations victory

articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler questions the use of the concussion replacement rule after defeat by India in the fourth T20.
articles.title: India vs England: Harshit Rana concussion sub questioned by Jos Buttler after hosts' win

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Blackburn Rovers take on Preston North End in the EFL Championship.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Blackburn Rovers v Preston North End - score updates & text commentary

articles.description: Striker Jhon Duran joins Saudi Pro League side Al-Nassr for a reported £65m from Aston Villa.

articles.description: Neymar has returned to Santos, his boyhood club. BBC Sport looks back at his time with Barcelona, PSG and Al-Hilal, and considers what might happen next for Brazil's record scorer.
articles.title: Neymar signs for Santos: The prince who never became king at Barcelona or PSG

articles.description: Aston Villa are one of a number of clubs interested in Manchester United's out-of-favour striker Marcus Rashford.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Aston Villa interested in loan deal for Man Utd forward

articles.description: Manchester City will play Real Madrid while Celtic will face Bayern Munich in the Champions League play-off round.
articles.title: Champions League play-offs: Man City v Real Madrid, Celtic v Bayern

articles.description: BBC Sport has a first-hand account of the infamous Super Bowl blackout that happened the last time the big game was held in New Orleans.
articles.title: Super Bowl: The night the Superdome lights went out in New Orleans

articles.description: New England captain Maro Itoje says losing is not what he is about as his side prepares to open their Six Nations campaign against Ireland on Saturday.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England captain Maro Itoje says losing is not what he is about
